scripts.compile: em++ -o src/structures/assembly/output.js src/structures/assembly/src/heap/Heap.cpp src/structures/assembly/src/heap/NumberHeap.cpp src/structures/assembly/src/Bindings.cpp -s EXPORT_NAME='bindings' -s WASM_ASYNC_COMPILATION=0 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 --bind -O3
scripts.compile:cjs: em++ -o dist/cjs/structures/assembly/output.js src/structures/assembly/src/heap/Heap.cpp src/structures/assembly/src/heap/NumberHeap.cpp src/structures/assembly/src/Bindings.cpp -s EXPORT_NAME='bindings' -s WASM_ASYNC_COMPILATION=0 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 --bind -O3
scripts.compile:esm: em++ -o dist/esm/structures/assembly/output.js src/structures/assembly/src/heap/Heap.cpp src/structures/assembly/src/heap/NumberHeap.cpp src/structures/assembly/src/Bindings.cpp -s EXPORT_NAME='bindings' -s WASM_ASYNC_COMPILATION=0 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 --bind -O3
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn compile && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd && npm run build:types
